description: As a user I should be able to play in full screen mode.

steps.name: that the user is on the game page "http://localhost:3000"
the user clicks on the "Full screen" icon
the user should be able to play in full screen mode "true"

name: Full screen mode

description: As a user I want to win the game by obtaining 5 cups of espresso (based on my empirical knowledge about how to win the game).

elements.name: At the right place with the right starting values

steps.name: that I have started the game by navigating to "http://localhost:3000"
that my position is "outside the cafe"
the value of my "Health" should be 50
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: I navigate from outside the cafe to a crowded bar

steps.name: that my position is "outside the cafe"
that I make the choice to "Go north"
that I make the choice to "Go east"
the value of my "Health" should be 50
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"
my position should be "in a crowded bar"

elements.name: I stay at the crowded bar and wait for the bartender to give me a beer

steps.name: that my position is "in a crowded bar"
that I know my current health
I wait for the event "The bartender offers you a can of beer for free" to take place
my health should be "less or same as before"
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"

elements.name: I navigate from outside the crowded friendly bar to the guitarist and the sax player

steps.name: that my position is "in a crowded bar"
that I know my current health
that I make the choice to "Go west"
that I make the choice to "Go south"
that I make the choice to "Go south"
that I make the choice to "Go west"
my health should be "unchanged"
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"
my position should be "at the concert"

elements.name: I stay with guitarist and the sax player

steps.name: that my position is "at the concert"
that I know my current health
that I know my current menu choices
I wait for the event "why don't come on up and jam with us?" to take place
my health should be "less or same as before"
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"
I should be given the new choice "Jam with the band"

elements.name: I choose to jam with the guitarist and the sax player

steps.name: that my position is "at the concert"
that I know my current health
my health should be "unchanged"
the value of my "Money" should be 15
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"

elements.name: I navigate from the guitarist and the sax player to inside the Cloud Forest Cafe

steps.name: that my position is "at the concert"
that I know my current health
that I make the choice to "Go east"
that I make the choice to "Go north"
that I make the choice to "Enter the cafe"
my health should be "unchanged"
the value of my "Money" should be 15
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"
my position should be "inside the cafe"

elements.name: I stay at the Cloud Forest Cafe and wait for the barista to call a friend

steps.name: that my position is "inside the cafe"
that I know my current health
that I know my current menu choices
I wait for the event "The barista is in a dark corner phoning a friend" to take place
my health should be "less or same as before"
the value of my "Money" should be 15
the value of my "Espressos" should be 0
my hipster bag should contain "a can of beer"

elements.name: I give the barista my beer

steps.name: that my position is "inside the cafe"
that I know my current health
I should be given the new choice "Give beer to barista"
my health should be "20 more than before"
the value of my "Money" should be 15
the value of my "Espressos" should be 2
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: I buy the third espresso of the day

steps.name: that my position is "inside the cafe"
that I know my current health
that I make the choice to "Buy an espresso"
my health should be "10 more than before"
the value of my "Money" should be 10
the value of my "Espressos" should be 3
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: I buy the fourth espresso of the day

steps.name: that my position is "inside the cafe"
that I know my current health
that I make the choice to "Buy an espresso"
my health should be "10 more than before"
the value of my "Money" should be 5
the value of my "Espressos" should be 4
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"

elements.name: I buy the fifth espresso of the day

steps.name: that my position is "inside the cafe"
that I know my current health
that I know my current menu choices
that I make the choice to "Buy an espresso"
my health should be "10 more than before"
the value of my "Money" should be 0
the value of my "Espressos" should be 5
my hipster bag should contain "nothing cool"
I should be given the new choice "Play again"

name: Win the game
